name: desk
look_description: This is a large oak desk which appears to have been well used. It is covered with miscellaneous office supplies: paper clips, writing instruments, and scraps of paper - none of which appear to be very important at this time. A large metal typewriter rests on its surface. The desk contains a large drawer, which is slightly ajar.

touch.text: The desk is smooth and sturdy. You don't feel anything out of place.

sit at.text: You sit down at the desk. It makes you feel momentarily important. You stand back up.

stand on.text: You climb on top of the desk and jump up and down a bit. The desk holds. It's old but it's good quality.

climb on.text: You climb on top of the desk and jump up and down a bit. The desk holds. It's old but it's good quality.

open.text: You open the desk drawer. There are several papers stacked inside, but one in particular catches your eye...

open drawer.text: You open the desk drawer. There are several papers stacked inside, but one in particular catches your eye...

open desk drawer.text: You open the desk drawer. There are several papers stacked inside, but one in particular catches your eye...
